name: mightoria-playwrightForPowerPlatformAdvanced
description: Execute end-to-end tests on Power Platform applications using Playwright with advanced configuration options. This DevOps extension automatically sets up Playwright, installs dependencies, runs your test suite against Power Platform apps, and generates comprehensive test reports with screenshots, traces, and detailed failure analysis for CI/CD pipelines.
author: mightoraio

inputs.name: testLocation
inputs.label: Test Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the folder containing Playwright tests to copy

inputs.name: browser
inputs.label: Browser
inputs.helpMarkDown: Browser to run the Playwright tests on. Each browser is installed and executed separately for optimal performance in CI/CD pipelines.

inputs.name: trace
inputs.label: Trace Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable tracing for debugging test failures. Traces capture screenshots, DOM snapshots, and network activity

inputs.name: outputLocation
inputs.label: Output Location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory where test results and reports will be copied. test-results and playwright-report folders will be created here

inputs.name: appUrl
inputs.label: Application URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the Power Platform application to test

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Power Platform application

inputs.name: o365Password
inputs.label: O365 Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Office 365 password for authentication (use Azure DevOps secret variable)

inputs.name: tenantId
inputs.label: Tenant ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Active Directory Tenant ID for the Power Platform application

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Application (Client) ID for authentication

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure AD Application Client Secret (use Azure DevOps secret variable)

inputs.name: userRole
inputs.label: User Role
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user role/security role to test with in the Power Platform application

inputs.name: team
inputs.label: Team
inputs.helpMarkDown: The team context for the user in the Power Platform application

inputs.name: businessUnit
inputs.label: Business Unit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The business unit context for the user in the Power Platform application
